compliant.section: The personal information that you are asked to provide, and the reasons why you are asked to provide it, will be made clear to you at the point we ask you to provide your personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Transparency and modalities of information; Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: If you contact us directly, we may receive additional information about you such as your name, email address, phone number, the contents of the message and/or attachments you may send us, and any other information you may choose to provide.
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: Consent By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
The right to access - You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
compliant.article numbers: Article 15 (Right of access by the data subject)
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller confirmation as to whether or not personal data concerning him or her are being processed, and, where that is the case, access to the personal data and to certain information.  The controller shall provide a copy of the personal data undergoing processing. For any further copies requested by the data subject, the controller may charge a reasonable fee based on administrative costs.

compliant.section: The right to rectification - You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller without undue delay the rectification of inaccurate personal data concerning him or her. Taking into account the purposes of the processing, the data subject shall have the right to have incomplete personal data completed, including by means of providing a supplementary statement.

compliant.section: The right to erasure - You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
compliant.article numbers: Article 17 (Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'))
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller the erasure of personal data concerning him or her without undue delay and the controller shall have the obligation to erase personal data without undue delay where one of the grounds applies.

compliant.section: The right to restrict processing - You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right to obtain from the controller restriction of processing where one of the following applies.

compliant.section: The right to object to processing - You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right to object, on grounds relating to his or her particular situation, at any time to processing of personal data concerning him or her which is based [on legitimate interests], including profiling based on those provisions. The controller shall no longer process the personal data unless the controller demonstrates compelling legitimate grounds for the processing which override the interests, rights and freedoms of the data subject or for the establishment, exercise or defence of legal claims.

compliant.section: The right to data portability - You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
compliant.legal provisions: The data subject shall have the right to receive the personal data concerning him or her, which he or she has provided to a controller, in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format and have the right to transmit those data to another controller without hindrance from the controller to which the personal data have been provided.

non_compliant.section: This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our website with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Groundhog Technologies / Groundhog Inc.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that it applies to both online and offline data processing activities, if applicable. It should also specify if data is collected directly from the user or from other sources.

non_compliant.section: This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this website.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that it applies to both online and offline data processing activities, if applicable. It should also specify if data is collected directly from the user or from other sources.

non_compliant.section: These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable.
non_compliant.amend: Even if not directly linked, the policy should clarify how they ensure that log files are not used to identify individuals, especially considering potential combination with other data.

non_compliant.section: Advertising Partners Privacy Policies You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of https://www .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject; Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should provide clear and accessible information about each third-party advertising partner, their data processing purposes, and legal basis for processing data. Simply referring to a list might not be sufficient.

non_compliant.section: We may charge you a small fee for this service.
non_compliant.article numbers: Article 15 (Right of access by the data subject)
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall provide a copy of the personal data undergoing processing. For any further copies requested by the data subject, the controller may charge a reasonable fee based on administrative costs.
non_compliant.amend: Charging a fee is only permitted for further copies of the data. The first copy must be provided free of charge.  Consider removing the fee or specifying that it only applies to additional copies.
